name: Alchemia: Creatio Ex Nihilo (itch)
description:
Welcome to the land of Alchemia, where magic and alchemy meet to create fantastical creatures and allow a few individuals to harness powers only dreamt of! In your journeys through this land you'll encounter foes, friends, ancient knowledge and relics from a bygone civilization, and much more!

  • 35+ different enemies to strategize against and defeat
  • 40+ unique recipes to discover, with over 10 quintillion possible combinations in each run
  • 30+ powerful artifacts to loot and customize your build
  • 15+ detailed events to encounter during journeys

...and Much More to Discover!
